IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: PROVIDE EDUCATION, ATHLETICS AND SOCIAL INTERACTIONS FOR STUDENTS IN GRADES 8-12
IRS990.MissionDescription: To establish and operate a Christian School or Schools of superior instruction, where the religious dimension of education can be acknowledged and developed in the academic curriculum, and where sound classical, scientific, technical and general education in preparation for higher education and responsible citizenship may be obtained by students of all races and all faiths.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Description of Intended Use of Endowment Funds:
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: Capital projects, scholarships, long-term financial stability of the school

PART XII, LINE 2D: SCHOLARSHIPS REPORTED WITH EXPENSES ON THIS RETURN $1,189,440; UNREALIZED LOSS ON SWAP REPORTED AS OTHER ADJUSTMENTS TO NET ASSETS ON THIS RETURN $346,396 PART XII, LINE 4B: TITANS CLOSET EXPENSE REPORTED WITH REVENUE ON THIS RETURN $46,241 PART XIII, LINE 2D: TITANS CLOSET EXPENSE REPORTED WITH REVENUE ON THIS RETURN $46,241 PART XIII, LINE 4B: SCHOLARSHIPS REPORTED WITH EXPENSES ON THIS RETURN $1,189,440 PART X: FIN 48 FOOTNOTE TEXT, N/A

IRS990ScheduleE.PubViaBroadcastMediaExpln: ANNUAL ADVERTISEMENT IN LOCAL NEWSPAPER STATES NONDISCRIMINATION POLICY

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Identifier: Procedure for Monitoring Grants in the U.S.:
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: Schedule I, Part I, Line 2: We receive requests for financial aid including statement that provides personal financial data. Business Manager computes amount of financial aid student is eligible for. The Compensation Committe then reviews and determines the final award amount.

Form990ScheduleJPartIII.Explanation: Thomas Aycock, Headmaster, has a nonqualified deferred executive compensation agreement.
Headmaster bonus based upon various criteria, one of which is student enrollment

IssuerName.BusinessNameLine1: the virginia small business financing authority series 2010A

Form990ScheduleKPartI.DescriptionOfPurpose: for construction of an athletic center

IssuerName.BusinessNameLine1: the virginia small business financing authority series 2010B

Form990ScheduleKPartI.DescriptionOfPurpose: for construction of an athletic center

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Business Manager/Treasurer of Finance Committee review the 990 with full Board of Directors prior to its issuance

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Each board member signs a "certificate of acknowledgement" stating they have been made aware and understand the school's policies. Transactions that involve a current board member are evaluated by the business manager, headmaster, and board officers.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15a
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Executive Committee reviews and recommends Headmaster compensation. All other compensation is reviewed and approved by Headmaster and Business Manager.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Provide copies of audited financials, governing documents, conflict of interest policies upon request.
No change was made in current year regarding process for oversight of audit and selection of independent accountant
Suntrust Bank is holding proceeds of bond issue. Disbursments of the proceeds have and will be made according to construction loan provisions outlined in the bond agreement.

Form990ScheduleRPartI.PrimaryActivities: to foster & support the charitable & educational purposes of the school.
